News.headline: Football Weekend at the Daggers
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed weekend of sport at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
The Daggers bar will show West Ham's trip to Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park which kicks off at 5:30pm on Saturday which follows directly after our Emirates FA Cup fixture at home to Wealdstone FC which kicks off at 3:00pm.

Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with a double header of fixtures. Middlesborough host Watford at the Riverside Stadium at 1:30pm followed by Southampton vs Burnley at the St Mary's Stadium which kicks off at 4:00pm.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. Please note that these offers are for the Sunday only.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
